Est. Mortgage: Estimated Monthly Payment Price: Down payment: % ( $31,540 ) 30 Year Fixed: 3.420% $561 /mo 15 Year Fixed 2.854% $862 /mo 5/1 ARM: 2.556% $502 /mo Estimated taxes&insurance of $356 are not included.
See current rates On $561 /mo See current rates on Zillow
Beds: 4 Baths: 2 Sqft: 1,977 Lot: 43,560 sq ft / 1.00 acres Type: Single Family Year built: 1984 Parking: -- Cooling: Central Heating: -- Fireplace: Yes What a BEAUTY! ''Hamptons Style Home'' a stone's throw from the shores of LAKE LIVINGSTON! Subdiv boat ramp is just across the street. Home has a Detached oversized garage--PERFECT for a WORKSHOP and/or your boat! 4BR/2BA, large corner lot, outdoor storage building, partially privacy fenced for the 4-legged members of the family, this home will DELIGHT w/ laminate flooring in living area and tile in the Large Eat-In Kitchen with HUGE Breakfast Counter. Make 5 Lakeshore your 2nd Home or Primary! … Neighborhood Description Family friendly, homes only subdivision, 2 boat launches, one on Lake Shore and the other on Arrowhead Ln, Cove Marina is off of Carolina Way! More Less More facts Zestimates for 5 Lake Shore Drive
